revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Comtrend |model=VR-3031 |revision=u |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/04/2013 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=L9VVR-3031U |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63168 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF1G08AA-TI |fla1_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68816CWQD-25H |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM63168 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=VDSL2, ADSL2+ |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Comtrend_XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Comtrend_[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=12345 |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless Multi-DSL Router}} [http://www.comtrend.com/links/180$product.htm Product page] "50XX13-182" and a date code of '''1214''' (April 2012) is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. Default settings are per the FCC manual - they may be inaccurate. :Additionally, other accounts are specified... :*User access: user:user :*Remote (WAN) access: support:support The power adapter shown in the FCC photos is an '''Amigo''' :AMS9-1201000FU2 (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.5A -> 12VDC, 1.0A). *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/comtrend/vr3032u ''Comtrend VR-3032u'' on '''OpenWRT Wiki'''] 
System-On-Chip:	Broadcom BCM63168 SoC
CPU/Speed:	BMIPS4350 v8.0 / 400 MHz
NAND:	128 MiB (MX30LF1G08AA-TI)
RAM:	64 MiB / DDR2 (EM68816CWQD-25H)
Wireless:	BCM6362 802.11bgn (SoC)
Ethernet:	Integrated BCM63168
USB:		Yes
Power adapter:	12V DC 1A / UP0121B-12PE
